meanings.definition: Relating to an organic compound containing an amino group.
meanings.sent1: The amino solution was used in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: She studied the amino structure in biology class.
meanings.sent3: The amino compound threw a party for the other molecules.
meanings.sent4: His amino personality made him stand out in the group.
meanings.sent5: The amino smell of the lab lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: A building block of proteins, consisting of an amino group and a carboxyl group.
meanings.sent1: The body needs amino to build proteins.
meanings.sent2: He consumed amino supplements after his workout.
meanings.sent3: The amino block was the star of the protein party.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like amino, forming strong connections.
meanings.sent5: The chef added a dash of amino to enhance the flavor.
